findings.title: Use of block.timestamp for critical logic
findings.explanation: Using block.timestamp for time-sensitive logic allows miners to slightly manipulate the timestamp, potentially causing the sale to end earlier or later than intended.
findings.fix_suggestion: Consider using a block number–based timeout with an average block time calculation or incorporate a buffer period to account for timestamp manipulation. Alternatively, use a trusted off-chain time oracle.

unmatched_predictions.title: Use of block.timestamp for critical logic
